title: Getting Started
description: Learn how to get started with Abstract, from setting up your account to creating your first project.

title: Workspace
description: Understand how the workspace is organized and how to navigate through your projects.

title: Collaboration
description: Collaborate with your team members by sharing projects, commenting, and reviewing changes.

title: Version Control
description: Learn about version control and how to manage different versions of your projects.

title: Integrations
description: Discover the integrations available in Abstract and how to connect them to your workflow.

title: Support
description: Get help and support for any issues you may encounter while using Abstract.
